summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the Seattle School District for financial assistance to make Seattle's school campuses safer by training officers to respond to situations involving armed suspects harming or threatening to harm students or school personnel; accepting the money when received; increasing the 2002 Budget of the Police Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
